name: exogenesis
author: [blue]AureusStratus, revamped by Rosnok & more
description:
(READ) This mod uses the same internal name as exogenesis. 
This is so that you can use exogenesis save data with this mod. 
However, this makes the mods incompatible. 
Exogenesis revamped with Java for better performance and compatibility. 
A mod that adds tons of new content including 5 unique factions.
